summary: Stan, who has remained faithfully at his World War I post for twenty years, finally comes home where his best friend, Ollie, takes him in, thus allowing him to discover the many conveniences of the modern world.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Patricia Ellis|Minna Gombell|Billy Gilbert|James Finlayson|Zeffie Tilbury|Harry Anderson|Walter Bacon|Mike Behegan|Billy Bletcher|Tommy Bond|Ed Brandenburg|Tex Driscoll|Olin Francis|Bud Geary|Pat Gleason|Henry Hall|Jack Hill|Max Hoffman Jr.|Karl 'Karchy' Kosiczky|Sam Lufkin|John Mack|Patsy Moran|James C. Morton|Harry Myers|Cyril Ring|William Royle|Tom Seidel|George Sorel|Harry Strang|Harry Tenbrook|Al Thompson|Joe Whitehead|Chill Wills|Allen Wood|Harry Woods
keywords: world war one veteran|world war one|husband wife relationship|dysfunctional marriage|taming of the shrew
title: Heroes de tachuela
